title: Jimmy O'Connor's Windham Mountain Inn | Explore & Relax Now
text: Located in Windham New York, Jimmy O’Connors Windham Mountain Inn an authentic Irish pub offer a warm Fáilte (welcome) to you and yours. We offer rooms, serve food, beer, wine and spirits. Located just minutes from Ski Windham Across the street from Windham Country Club, minutes’ drive to everything else. Hiking, Biking and Main Street Windham Strolls. Experience the Catskill Region, or just stay with us and relax with a pint. Learn more about our story. Enjoy a hearty pint of Murphy’s Irish Stout after your day on the slopes, the golf course, or work. With a friendly atmosphere and staff, everyone feels at home at Jimmy O’Connors. In addition to stout, we offer selection of beer, a full bar and a variety of classic pub food options. Check out our menu
